Package zoo.manager.controllers

Class ZooController

java.lang.Object
zoo.manager.controllers.ZooController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/zoo_manager") public class ZooController extends Object
Class which is used as controller for REST service for repositories.
Since:
JDK 17

  • Method Details

    • findAllAnimalsByZoneName

      @GetMapping(value="/animal/all/byZone", produces="application/json") @ResponseStatus(OK) public Iterable<Animal> findAllAnimalsByZoneName(@RequestParam("zoneName") String zoneName)
      Handle HTTP request method GET on /animal/all/byZone path, which return all animals in a database by specified zone name.
      Parameters:
      zoneName - Name of specified zone.
      Returns:
      Body of founded animals in database as iterable object of class
      See Also:
      • AnimalRepositoryHandler

    • findAllAnimalsByName

      @GetMapping(value="/animal/all/byName", produces="application/json") @ResponseStatus(OK) public Iterable<Animal> findAllAnimalsByName(@RequestParam("animalName") String animalName)
      Handle HTTP request method GET on /animal/all/byName path, which return all animals in animals by specified name
      Parameters:
      animalName - Name of specified animal
      Returns:
      Body of founded animlas in database as iterable object of class

    • findZoneWithHighestExpenses

      @GetMapping(value="/zone/zoneWithHighestExpenses", produces="application/json") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ZoneWithHighestExpensesRes findZoneWithHighestExpenses() throws NoSuchElementException
      Handle HTTP request method GET on /zone/zoneWithHighestExpense path, which return zone with the highest expenses.
      Returns:
      Object of Class with zone, which have the highest expenses.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - No records has been found

    • findZoneWithLowestOccupants

      @GetMapping(value="/zone/zoneWithLowestOccupants", produces="application/json") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ZoneWithAnimalsCountedUpRes findZoneWithLowestOccupants() throws NoSuchElementException
      Handle HTTP request method GET on /zone/zoneWithLowestOccupants path, which return zone with the lowest amount of registered animals.
      Returns:
      Object of Class with zone, which have the highest amount of registered animals.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - No records has been found

    • addZone

      @PostMapping(value="/zone", consumes="application/json", produces="plain/text") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public String addZone(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid Zone zone)
      Handle HTTP request method POST on /zone path, which add zone to database. Provide message with UUID of successfully created zone.
      Parameters:
      zone - Object of Class in JSON format
      Returns:
      String message of successfully created zone.

    • addSpecies

      @PostMapping(value="/species", consumes="application/json", produces="plain/text") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public String addSpecies(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid Species species)
      Handle HTTP request method POST on /species path, which add species to database. Provide message with UUID of successfully created species.
      Parameters:
      species - Object of Class in JSON format.
      Returns:
      String message of successfully created zone.

    • addAnimal

      @PostMapping(value="/animal", consumes="application/json", produces="plain/text") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public String addAnimal(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid AddAnimalReq animalReq)
      Handle HTTP request method POST on /animal path, which add animal to database. Provide message with UUID of successfully created animal. Produces and consumes JSON format.
      Parameters:
      animalReq - Object of Class, which contains zone name and species for further finding it existing in a database.
      Returns:
      String message of successfully created zone.
